remarks: A _distributive lattice_ is a lattice in which meets distribute over joins, or equivalently ( ~ latdisd ) joins distribute over meets. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Jan-2015.)
statement:
df-dlat $p |- DLat = { k e. Lat | [. ( Base ` k ) / b ]. [. ( join ` k ) / j ]. [. ( meet ` k ) / m ]. A. x e. b A. y e. b A. z e. b ( x m ( y j z ) ) = ( ( x m y ) j ( x m z ) ) } $.
$d b j k m x y z $.
